name: A Journey's Enigma
description:
A young boy who was banished from his straggling village for believing that there was a life to be held beyond the everlasting stars they could see in the sky. The boy has unfortunately found proof that they are in fact not in what may be the real. With nothing left but his pride, he journeys through his world to find the “edge of existence” and finds cool things on the way to help him in his adventure. However, getting to the surface really only let’s him know that him and his family were just a public experiment that have been a source of study but also entertainment for all of modern humanity, despite their circumstance. 

Credits to:

Level Designers- Sam Jack Chris F.

--Controls-- W - move left D - move right J - dash (dash is how you kill enemies) Space - Jump (Jump again for double jump) Catapult (Red) - High Jump on contact Time Stop (Yellow) - slows down time for all things but Players movement speed. Gravity is still slow. Dash (Blue) - allows player to travel a large distance in a short burst. Dashing makes you invincible to projectiles and kills enemies! Can also dash midair. Head to the end and make it out!
